title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: **Docker Security**: Pinned Docker images to SHA256 digests in multiple Dockerfiles to enhance security.
**Copilot Documentation**: Restructured Copilot feature matrix to display features by IDE and version group, improving clarity and maintainability.
**Copilot Data**: Updated supported clients for GPT-5.2-Codex model to include VS, Eclipse, Xcode, and JetBrains. Restructured version data for Copilot features.
**Content Linter**: Fixed crash by ignoring unknown markdownlint rules in linter output.
summary:
- **Docker Security**: Pinned Docker images to SHA256 digests in multiple Dockerfiles to enhance security.
- **Copilot Documentation**: Restructured Copilot feature matrix to display features by IDE and version group, improving clarity and maintainability.
- **Copilot Data**: Updated supported clients for GPT-5.2-Codex model to include VS, Eclipse, Xcode, and JetBrains. Restructured version data for Copilot features.
- **Content Linter**: Fixed crash by ignoring unknown markdownlint rules in linter output.
generated_title: Enhance Copilot docs, fix Docker security, and improve content linter
commits: **1df518a**: Fix content linter crash when markdownlint returns unknown rules (#59335) (by Kevin Heis)
**429dc3b**: Update model-supported-clients.yml to support more clients (#59338) (by Brian)
**feabe97**: Fix Docker security issues: pin images to SHA256 and update base image (#59343) (by Kevin Heis)
**d461c1d**: Update Copilot feature ide matrix (#59294) (by Sunbrye Ly)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- **Docker Security**: Pinned Docker images to SHA256 digests in multiple Dockerfiles to enhance security.
- **Copilot Documentation**: Restructured Copilot feature matrix to display features by IDE and version group, improving clarity and maintainability.
- **Copilot Data**: Updated supported clients for GPT-5.2-Codex model to include VS, Eclipse, Xcode, and JetBrains. Restructured version data for Copilot features.
- **Content Linter**: Fixed crash by ignoring unknown markdownlint rules in linter output.

### Title
Enhance Copilot docs, fix Docker security, and improve content linter
